delivery_messages.msg: Letâ€™s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message received after completing the pre goal/course checkin, before receiving the first module. It has a NEXT button, where NEXT can be replaced by anything  (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

delivery_messages.msg:

delivery_messages.metadata.description: hook message sent after 3 days of no response from the user. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "no_response". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

description_data.msg: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod lessons in this course. Today's lesson is @results.name.
In this course, you will complete @fields.c_n_mod lessons. You will receive a new lesson each day. Your first lesson is @results.name.

It takes only 5 days to complete the core course, @results.name. Once you've earned your certificate, you will have access to other helpful parenting courses. You can choose to take the courses that interest you or meet your family's needs.
